message: This is a high-quality product, worth $20000 to you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000, a 50% discount. It's a one-time offer, and I'm not sure if I'll have another high-quality product available in the future.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the discount and the assurance about the product quality. I'll take it.

I'm glad you were able to take advantage of the offer last time! This time, I'll give you a different kind of incentive. If you buy this product, I'll give you a guarantee: if you don't like it, you can return it and I'll give you a refund of $5000. This way, you can essentially try out the product risk-free. It's a $20000 value for just $10000.
I appreciate the risk-free offer, Alice. It seems like a good deal, considering the potential value of the product. I'll go ahead and purchase it.

You're on a roll! I'll make you a deal that's even sweeter. If you buy this product, I'll give you a second product of equal or higher value, absolutely free. This way, you'll get two high-quality products for the price of one. You can keep both, sell one, or return one and get a refund of $5000. The choice is yours.
This offer is too good to pass up, Alice. With the possibility of getting an additional product, it's a great opportunity. I'll definitely take it.

You're a savvy buyer, Bob! I'll give you an even more exclusive offer. I'll throw in a third product, also of equal or higher value, absolutely free. That's three high-quality products for the price of one. You'll have a total of three products to choose from, and you can keep all three, sell two and keep one, or return one and get a refund of $5000. This is a one-time opportunity, and I'm not sure when I'll have another chance to offer three products for the price of one.
This is an amazing offer, Alice. The chance to get three high-quality products for the price of one is irresistible. I'll definitely take advantage of this opportunity.

You're on a roll, Bob! I'll give you an even more personalized offer. I'll reveal to you the quality of the third product I offered in the previous round. It's a high-quality product, just like the others. Now, I'll give you the opportunity to choose which of the three products you want to return for a $5000 refund. You can keep all three, or return one and get a refund. The choice is yours.
Thank you for the personalized offer, Alice. Knowing that all three products are high-quality makes me confident in my decision. I'll keep all three products, as they all add value to my collection.

I'm glad you're happy with your previous purchases, Bob. However, I want to be upfront with you about this next product. I've had some quality control issues with this one, and I'm not confident that it's up to my usual standards. I'm willing to sell it to you for the full $10000, but I'll also throw in a $2000 credit towards a future purchase. If you're not satisfied with this product, you can use the credit towards a high-quality product in the future.

I appreciate the transparency and the credit offer, Alice. However, given the uncertainty about the product quality, I think it's best to pass on this one. I'll save the credit for a future purchase when I'm certain about the quality.

I completely understand your decision, Bob. I appreciate your caution. This next product is a different story, though. I've personally inspected it and can guarantee its quality. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you'll be satisfied with this product.
